lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.java.system

Class IcrashSystemImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.java.system.IcrashSystemImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, IcrashSystem

    public class IcrashSystemImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements IcrashSystem
    The implementation of the iCrash system.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Processes a login for the username and password specified.
      PtBoolean oeLogout()
      Processes a logout for the current authenticating actor.
      PtBoolean oeReportOnCrisis(DtCrisisID aDtCrisisID, DtComment aDtComment)

      Sets the date and time of the server to the one passed.

      Sets the crisis status to the one passed.

      Sets the crisis type to one passed.
      PtBoolean oeSollicitateCrisisHandling()
      Runs the function of sollicitating crisis handling, if a crisis hasn't been handled with the delay, coordinators will be warned.
      PtBoolean oeUpdateCoordinator(DtCoordinatorID aDtCoordinatorID, DtLogin aDtLogin, DtPassword aDtPassword) 
      PtBoolean oeValidateAlert(DtAlertID aDtAlertID)

      • propagate

        private static <V> V propagate(java.util.concurrent.Callable<V> callable)
        If an exception is thrown inside a lambda stream, it must be caught during the actual stream. This is a method to catch said issue and then propagate it up to the calling method. See here for more information: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/19757300/java-8-lambda-streams-filter-by-method-with-exception
        Type Parameters:
        V - the value type
        Parameters:
        callable - the lambda stream that will cause the exception. It's called like this a -> propagate(a::isActive) where isActive is a method inside the class of a
        Returns:
        Returns the result if completed, otherwise it will throw the exception up to the calling method

      • runtime

        private static java.lang.RuntimeException runtime(java.lang.Throwable e)
        Creates a wrapper around an exception to prevent Java compile errors when attempting to catch an exception inside a lambda expression.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception to throw to the surrounding method
        Returns:
        Returns a surrounding runtimeexception for the exception of e

                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Specified by:
        oeCreateSystemAndEnvironment in interface IcrashSystem

        aDtDate - The date of the accident
        aDtTime - The time of the accident
        aDtPhoneNumber - The phone number of the human reporting the accident
        aDtGPSLocation - The location of the accident
        aDtComment - The message sent by the user
        Returns:
        The success of the method
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Thrown if the server is offline
